title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 824.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 824.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) (1)

Specialized services shall mean addiction
services not defined in other Parts of this Title. Specialized services shall
be defined by the Commissioner pursuant to section
19.07
of
the Mental Hygiene Law and shall require an appropriate review and approval of
a certification or recertification application pursuant to this Title. Such
services may be provided in any setting deemed appropriate by the

Commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
824.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 3, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 05, eff. 2/3/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
